x		x<<3		x>>2(logical)	x>>2(arithmetic)
Bin	 Hex	Bin	 Hex	Bin	 Hex	Bin	 Hex
11000011 0xC3	00011000 0x18	00110000 0x30	11110000 0xF0
01110101 0x75	10101000 0xA8	00011101 0x1D	00011101 0x1D
10000111 0x87	00111000 0x38	00100001 0x21	11100001 0xE1
01100110 0x66	00110000 0x30	00011001 0x19	00011001 0x19
Note: Hex is short for hexadecimal, and Bin is short for Binary.
